channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Elad Gil isn’t just ahead of the curve — he practically lives there. Before most of the world had even asked ChatGPT its first question, Gil was writi...

item.title: Elon Musk says X plans to introduce ads in Grok’s responses
item.description: The move would help power X's struggling ads business following the departure of former CEO Linda Yaccarino.

item.title: The backlash against Duolingo going ‘AI-first’ didn’t even matter

item.title: The Best Hearing Aids of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested and audiologist-approved devices will help you hear sounds more clearly. Never miss out on a dinner conversation again.

item.title: AI agents aren’t the ‘new Google,’ says Airbnb CEO
item.description: "I think we're still kind of feeling out the space," CEO Brian Chesky told investors on the Q2 earnings call.

item.title: Best Tested Walking Pads (2025): Urevo, WalkingPad, Sperax
item.description: These compact walking pads fit under your desk and make staying active so much easier.

item.title: The Best Golf Rangefinders (2025)
item.description: Unlock the course and raise your game with the best golf rangefinders you can buy.

item.title: Truth Social’s AI search is powered by Perplexity, but the platform can set limits on sources

item.title: Trump Is Undermining Trust in Official Economic Statistics. China Shows Where That Path Can Lead
item.description: China demonstrates how manipulating economic data can ultimately erode government credibility.

item.title: Framework Desktop Review: A Delightful Surprise
